content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-15

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) consuming coal (manually inserted) and water to produce steam. *Status: NO_FUEL (requires manual refueling)*
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5) consuming steam to generate electricity. *Status: WORKING*
- PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (fluid_system=8300). *Status: FULL_OUTPUT*
- PipeGroup connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine (fluid_system=8302). *Status: WORKING*

### Crude Oil Extraction and Storage at (x=17.5, y=40.5) to (x=25.5, y=43.5)
Extracts crude oil from the ground and stores it. Powered by the steam power generation setup.
Consists of the following entities:
- Pumpjack at (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil. *Status: WORKING*
- Storage Tank at (x=25.5, y=43.5) storing crude oil. *Status: WORKING*
- PipeGroup connecting the Pumpjack to the Storage Tank (fluid_system=8304). *Status: WORKING*
- ElectricityGroup (id=19621) connecting the Steam Engine to the Pumpjack via Small Electric Poles (positions omitted for brevity).

### Basic Oil Refining at (x=30.5, y=63.5) to (x=40.5, y=66.5)
Refines crude oil
